email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Reset Your 2FA for Google Account

Dear Valued Google User,

We are writing to inform you that our security systems have detected some unusual activity on your Google account. In order to protect your account from unauthorized access, we kindly ask you to reset your Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) immediately.

To reset your 2FA, please click on the link below and follow the on-screen instructions:

[Malicious Link]

It is important that you take action promptly to ensure the security of your account and personal information. Failure to reset your 2FA may result in your account being compromised.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact our support team.

Sincerely,
The Google Security Team
